text:
Dear sir


Your sales and service team want to murder the dealer.


Sales team don't want to credit the retail scheme in dealership account and service team don't want to give service on time.

We already running the dealership in loss.

So we are not Ambani's.

In that case we want to discontinue the dealership.

My all the balance with security deposit in my dealership bank account .

And from today onwards we will not entertain any after sales service in our services centre.

We will give the toll free number to customers.


Your team not giving response¬†


It's almost 5 days to mail ,but not respond from your side.

Should I go legally.

Should I forget the 4 years relationship with Greaves.

Should I called to every customer and registered the legal case against greaves?¬†

Should I complaint fame 2 about?

Should I promote this on social media?

Should I promote this to your investors?

Regards 
Shri Laxmi automobiles 
Bulandshahr 
Uttar Pradesh North

author: @mohdhaseeb89-l1j

text:
5 saal 75k km ko aap extend nahi kara sakte. 
rizta extra 5k par 80k km + 8 saal ki warranty de raha hai + 70% battery health aur wo loog or lfi battery bhi use nahi kar rahe. 
bas yehi baat khatak rahi hai. 
ki itne lfi battery na hone par bhi lfi battery walo se zyada warranty kaise? 

8 saal me bhi agar battery 70% se niche nahi jayegi to yani pure 15 saal ussi battery par chalne ki shamta rakhta hai rizta. 

ab criteria kya hoga. koi hidden chalaki to nahi hogi rizta walo dwara yeh to customer reviews bateyenge lekin company apna naam kharab kyu karergi market me. 

new battery aaram se 40k ke around hogi. yani 85k+40k= 125k inr ki padi aur rizta 2.9kwh wali 138k inr ki hai jisme digital console aur turn by turn navigation wagera hai. 
jo magnus neo me nahi hai. 

agar nexus se compare karu to wo 110 inr ki hai aur uski battery 60k inr ke aas paas batayi thi. 8k me 3 saal 75k km ki warranty extend hogi sare scooter ki kewal battery ki nahi. 
rizta me kewal battery hai. 

boot space rizta me acchi hai. 

fir service rizta wale acchi de rahe hai. 

kaun si better rahegi overall ab aap loog swayam hi iska nirnaye lein

2025 me BLDC hub motor ki ev lena ak ghaate ka sauda hai.
Ev 2-wheeler buying filter:
1. Bldc motor
2. Less then 90km range
3. More then 1 lac budget
4. Lead acid battery
5. Few or distant service center
Ye sab points ko hata kar jo bhi gadi best lage le sakte hain.
